Jiaxing Jeanne Yu

Hello! I am the first-year PhD student in the Department of Linguistics at Rutgers University.
I received my MA in General Linguistics from the University of Rochester in 2020 and BA in Chinese Literature and Languages from Nanjing University in 2018.
